materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph taken in Shahdara, Lahore. There is a water body in the foreground of the photograph. In the center, there is a small plot of land with concrete ruins, with only two pillars holding an archway still standing. In the background, there is some vegetation, and three tall towers. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Shahdara, Lahore
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Lahore (Pakistan) Shahdheri (Pakistan) Ruins
